question:
Match the pigments given in List I with their colour in chromatogram given in List II.

| List I (Pigments) | List II (Colour in chromatogram) |
|---|---|
| 1. Chlorophyll 'b' | p. Yellow orange |
| 2. Carotenoids | q. Orange red |
| 3. Chlorophyll 'a' | r. Yellow |
| 4. Xanthophylls | s. Blue green |
| | t. Yellow green |
explanation: Chlorophyll b is Yellow green (1-t). Chlorophyll a is Blue green (3-s). Xanthophylls are Yellow (4-r). Carotenoids are Yellow to Orange (2-p is the closest match in the given context or general scheme, but option B pairs 2-p).
